content.body: keithamus: is marking https://github.com/whatwg/url/issues/864 as invalid problematic for the anti-spam efforts?
content.formatted_body: keithamus: is marking https://github.com/whatwg/url/issues/864 as invalid problematic for the anti-spam efforts?

content.body: No, it’s one of many signals, alone it does not warrant something to be spam.
